regcore_read.views package¶

Submodules¶

regcore_read.views.diff module¶

regcore_read.views.diff.get(request, label_id, old_version, new_version)[source]¶

Find and return the diff with the provided label / versions

regcore_read.views.es_search module¶

If using the Elastic Search backend, this endpoint provides search results. If using haystack, see haystack_search.py

regcore_read.views.es_search.search(request)[source]¶

Search elastic search for any matches in the node’s text

regcore_read.views.es_search.transform_results(results)[source]¶

Pull out unused fields, add title field from layers if possible

regcore_read.views.haystack_search module¶

If using the haystack backend, this endpoing provides search results. If using Elastic Search, see es_search.py

regcore_read.views.haystack_search.search(request)[source]¶

Use haystack to find search results

regcore_read.views.haystack_search.transform_results(results)[source]¶

Add title field from layers if possible

regcore_read.views.layer module¶

regcore_read.views.layer.get(request, name, label_id, version)[source]¶

Find and return the layer with this name + version + label

regcore_read.views.notice module¶

regcore_read.views.notice.get(request, docnum)[source]¶

Find and return the notice with this docnum

regcore_read.views.notice.listing(request)[source]¶

Find and return all notices

regcore_read.views.regulation module¶

regcore_read.views.regulation.get(request, label_id, version)[source]¶

Find and return the regulation with this version and label

regcore_read.views.regulation.listing(request, label_id)[source]¶

List versions of this regulation
